  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3663</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3663</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Galí: Què faig? Què compro? On vaig?</string>
            <string language="en">Galí: What shall I do? What shall I buy? Where shall I go?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galí: Was soll ich tun? Was soll ich
kaufen? Wo soll ich gehen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galí : Queest-ce que je dois faire ? 
Queest-ce que je dois acheter ? Où dois-je aller ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galí: Que devo eu fazer? Que devo eu
comprar? Onde devo eu ir?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galí: Che cosa fare? Che cosa 
comprare? Dove andare?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galν: Τι θα κάνω; Τι θα αγοράσω; 
Πού θα πάω;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Menú d'activitats interactives que presenta i practica les expressions de les accions quotidianes i les relacions comercials i professionals. Les activitats desenvolupen el vocabulari bàsic de cada tema i les estructures sintàctiques mínimes, alhora que promouen la comprensió i l'expressió oral i escrita.</string>
            <string language="en">A variety of interactive activities present and practice expressions used in everyday actions and in commercial and professional relations. The activities develop the basic vocabulary and sentence structures for each context, while promoting oral and written comprehension and expression.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió oral</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comunicació oral</string>
            <string language="en">speech communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió del text</string>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión del texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Vielzahl der interaktiven Aktivitäten Geschenk- und 
Praxisausdrücke verwendet in den täglichen Tätigkeiten und in den 
kommerziellen und professionellen Relationen. Die Aktivitäten 
entwickeln die grundlegenden Wortschatz- und Programmsatzstrukturen 
für jeden Kontext, bei der Förderung des Mund- und schriftlichen 
Erfassens und des Ausdruckes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une variété d'expressions interactives de présent et de
pratique en matière d'activités utilisées dans des actions 
journalières et dans des relations commerciales et professionnelles. 
Les activités développent les structures de base de 
vocabulaire et de phrase pour chaque contexte, tout en favorisant la 
compréhension et l'expression orales et écrites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma variedade das expressões interativas do presente e da
prática das atividades usadas em ações diárias e em relações 
comerciais e profissionais. As atividades desenvolvem as 
estruturas básicas do vocabulário e de sentença para cada contexto,
ao promover a compreensão e a expressão orais e escritas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una varietà di espressioni interattive del presente e di 
pratica di attività usate nelle azioni giornalieri e nei rapporti 
commerciali e professionali. Le attività sviluppano le 
strutture di base di frase e di vocabolario per ogni contesto, mentre 
promuovono la comprensione e l'espressione orali e scritte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποικίλες διαλογικές εκφράσεις παρόντος και πρακτικής 
δραστηριοτήτων που χρησιμοποιούνται στις καθημερινές ενέργειες και
στις εμπορικές και επαγγελματικές σχέσεις. Οι δραστηριότητες
αναπτύσσουν τις βασικές δομές λεξιλογίου και πρότασης για κάθε 
πλαίσιο, προωθώντας την προφορικές και γραπτές κατανόηση και την 
έκφραση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechfunkanlage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverständnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission de la parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension des textes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação de discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">communicazione verbale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione del testo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεκτική επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση κειμένων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
